questions.questionText: What is the land in the first Dark souls called?
questions.explanation: It's called Lodran, Lotric and Londor are different places and eras.

questions.questionText: Who of these is NOT a knight of Gwyn
questions.explanation: Despite protecting Anor Londo with Ornstein, he was infact not a Knight of Gwyn
Seath betrayed the ancient by reveiling their weakness to lightning

questions.questionText: From where did the Abyss originate?
questions.explanation: It was in Oolacile the Abyss was formed by the father of the Abyss, Manus

questions.questionText: Gravelord Nito, Gwyn Lord of light and the Witch of Izalith are three lords with a lord soul, Who is the fourth?
questions.explanation: It was the the furtive pygmy, so easily forgotten who was given the Dark soul

questions.questionText: Who of these is a Lord of Cinder
questions.explanation: Ludleth became a Lord of Cinder on his own volition and answered the call when the fire needed to be linked once more.

questions.questionText: Who of these knights of Catarina helped the ashen one to kill Yhorm the Giant?
questions.explanation: Siegmeyer and Sieglinde help you in the first Dark souls

questions.questionText: From who does the Abyss watchers take their inspiration from?
Which of these dragons is the last living of the Ancient dragon?
questions.explanation: Midir manage to survive until the end of the world, hidden under the Ringed city fighting the Abyss

questions.questionText: What city was built on the ruins of Anor Londo?
What painting do you visit in Dark souls 3?
Why did Yhorm the Giant decide not to link the flame after his resurrection?

options.text: He felt betrayed by the fire after it destroyed his people after linking the flame
He lost an important person to him and abandoned his duty
Pontiff Sulyvahn convinced Yhorm to abandon his duty to link the flame

questions.questionText: Which character from the original Dark souls is still alive in Dark souls 3?
Who is the child of Seath the scaleless?
Why did the ashen ones rise?

options.text: To free the Ithryll valley from Pontiff Sylavahns reign
To return the lords of cinder to their thrones
